title: The Invincible Undefeated Divine Sword Master - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Romance   School Life
tags: Absent Parents   Academy   Adapted to Manga   Anti-Magic   Aristocracy   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Brother Complex   Bullying   Calm Protagonist   Child Abuse   Cold Protagonist   Family Conflict   Genius Protagonist   Hidden Abilities   Incest   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sudden Strength Gain   Sword And Magic   Underestimated Protagonist   Younger Sisters
author: Hata Ryousuke   羽田遼亮
description:
Chosen by the divine sword as a 'natural gift'--this guy is a warrior and invincible!

Licht is the abominable son of a prestigious noble family. The guy, despised as incompetent by those around him, is the one with the 'natural talent' to pull out the legendary divine sword! With his invincible talent and undefeated swordsmanship - a guy who boasts infinite strength, he takes on the Royal Academy, where vicious conspiracies are swirling around him!>
